snippet: The Red Cross has suspended operations across much of Pakistan after the killing of a British nurse working for the organization late last month, the group announced Thursday.
abstract: Red Cross suspends operations across much of Pakistan after the killing of a British nurse working for the organization; move means many thousands of people will go without medical and other development assistance for the duration of the suspension.
lead_paragraph: The Red Cross has suspended operations across much of Pakistan after the killing of a British nurse working for the organization late last month, the group announced Thursday.

keywords.value: International Committee of the Red Cross
keywords.name: organizations
